docs.text:
Virtual Placement service




Source 
GitHub
.


Docker image [DockerHub] (https://hub.docker.com/r/ivukotic/vpservice/).


documentation
.


Presentation




REST API




/test - should always return "TEST_OK"


/ds/
n
/
ds_name
 - if dataset was already preplaced it returns ordered list of sites. If not preplaced returns ordered list of up to 
n
 sites. Dataset that should not be in the sistem returns: 
other
.


/site/
cloud
/
site
/
cores
 - sets or updates number of CPUs cores available for Virtual Placement. 


/site/
site
 - returns probability that a dataset will have 
site
 to be the first choice to place the data at.


/grid/
cores
 - sets or updates total number of cores available on the grid.

docs.text: /test - should always return "TEST_OK"  /ds/ n / ds_name  - if dataset was already preplaced it returns ordered list of sites. If not preplaced returns ordered list of up to  n  sites. Dataset that should not be in the sistem returns:  other .  /site/ cloud / site / cores  - sets or updates number of CPUs cores available for Virtual Placement.   /site/ site  - returns probability that a dataset will have  site  to be the first choice to place the data at.  /grid/ cores  - sets or updates total number of cores available on the grid.
